question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-data-service-v2/src/live_data_service/in_memory_cache.rs] [Function: get_data()] [Silent failure] Returning None at line 70 provides no error context - can this hide important failures from callers? (Low)
